Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer with two outs in the 10th inning
Austin Wells walked, followed by a grounder to second baseman Andrés Giménez, whose soft toss to the bag was dropped by rookie shortstop Brayan Rocchio for an error
Giancarlo Stanton hit a two-run homer
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees took care of the Guardians in five games
It wasn't easy for the Yankees, especially in Cleveland where all three games were nail-biters
Post-Match Reflections: A surprising season under first-year manager Stephen Vogt ended just short of a World Series
The franchise remains without a title since 1948, baseball's current longest drought
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians rallied to win Game 3 on two, two-run homers in their last two at-bats
The Yankees held on to win Game 4 after blowing a four-run lead
